title: Woman killed in accidental shooting
content:
An 18-year-old Paris woman was allegedly shot in the chest and died Saturday afternoon, according to Paris Police Chief Bob Hundley.
Preliminary reports indicate it was an accidental shooting, according to Hundley.
The incident happened shortly after 1:30 p.m. at an apartment at 210 Stone Ave. Hundley said emergency medical services personnel took the woman to the emergency room.
Hundley said they are not releasing the name of the victim until they are sure all family members have been notified.
Paris police are still investigating.
